data.comment: Today's referee, Cesar Arturo Ramos, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 3, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick America.
In the minute 8, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards America a goal kick.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 11, America have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
America are coming forward and Giovani Dos Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 19, America's Sebastian Cordova gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In Leon America attack through Sebastian Cordova. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 23, America have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Goal! Leon have got their heads in front thanks to a Fernando Navarro strike.
That's a fine assist from Fernando Navarro.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leon close to the penalty box.
America's Giovani Dos Santos misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for America in the half of Leon.
In the minute 30, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
America to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 31, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to America.
Leon needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Fernando Navarro (Leon) gets a yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 34, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a America throw-in in Leon's half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of America.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Sebastian Cordova.
Great play from Jorge Sanchez to set up the goal.
Leon's Pedro Aquino breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 38, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards America a goal kick.
Leon's Angel Mena gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 40, Luis Fuentes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 41, Luis Fuentes has recovered and rejoins the match in Leon.
America are pushing forward but Giovani Dos Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Leon have a goal kick.
Goal! Henry Martin gives America a 1-2 lead in Leon.
Nicolas Benedetti instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 43, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nicolas Benedetti for America who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
In the minute 45, Giovani Dos Santos of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
The first-half has ended.
Miguel Herrera (America) has taken off Nicolas Benedetti who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Leonardo Suarez is the replacement.
Goal! Fernando Navarro levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 45, Angel Mena with an assist there.
Cesar Arturo Ramos has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Leon.
America have a goal kick.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Free kick for America in the half of Leon.
In the minute 51, Angel Mena for Leon drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Luis Montes.
Angel Mena instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 53, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick America.
America drives forward and Luis Reyes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 55, Free kick for America in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Sergio Diaz is replacing Giovani Dos Santos for the away team.
In the minute 58, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Leon in the half of America.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Santiago Caseres (America) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 65, Throw-in America.
Can Leon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Luis Reyes (America) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
America have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 70, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 72, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Leon throw-in in America's half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Free kick America.
Leon make their first substitution with Joel Campbell replacing David Ramirez.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to America.
Leon's Joel Campbell is whistled for offside at Estadio Leon.
The home team replace Emanuel Gigliotti with Nicolas Sosa.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Free kick for America in the half of Leon.
In the minute 84, Roger Martinez is on a sub for Sergio Diaz for America.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to America.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
America to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 89, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to America.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
At Estadio Leon the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to America.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Cesar Arturo Ramos blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Juan Ignacio Gonzalez is replacing Jean Meneses for the home team.
Pedro Aquino is booked for the home team.
